name: An introduction to Umbraco Deploy in the backoffice

steps.title: Deploy Workspace area
steps.content: In here you can see the environment you are on, as well as the transfer queue for the next environment.

steps.title: settings section
steps.content: In the settings section of Umbraco it is possible to manage the deploy settings

steps.title: Deploy settings section
steps.content: There is several settings that you can manage from the deploy dashboard

steps.title: Deploy status
steps.content: From the Deploy status you can see which version of deploy you are on, the last time a operation was run on your project and the deployment status.

steps.title: Deploy Operations
steps.content: You can also run some Deploy Operations. like updating the Umbraco Schema, export the schema and clear the signatures.

steps.title: Download Deploy Artifacts
steps.content: It is also possible to download the deploy artifacts as a zip file with the Umbraco schema in form of UDA file.

steps.title: Configuration Details
steps.content: Here you can see the current environments configuration. To change the configurations the udaptes should be added in the appsettings.json file.

steps.title: Schema Comparison
steps.content: You can compare the schema on your environment which is managed by Umbraco Deploy.
